# srnet-client

srnet-client is package for connecting srnet server.

Usage:
```js
var srnetCLI = require("srnet-client");
var client = new srnetCLI(/*url*/);
//do something
client.connect();
```

## Events

 - data
 - notAsk
 - ask
 - receive
 - error
 - unknown
 - connect, connection
 - disconnect
